#private_key.description: Your SSH private key, including the BEGIN RSA .. part. If used, the password is ignored.
#private_key.title: SSH private key

disabled_algorithms.title: Algorithms to disable
disabled_algorithms.description: The disabled_algorithms for example: "{'pubkeys': ['rsa-sha2-256', 'rsa-sha2-512']}" Find additional details at Paramiko documentation.
